Text: Thanks for these!  Some old favourites here.

Thanks CalAtSoft, glad to hear it. Hope you find some new favorites in there also! Definitely read Perdido Street Station if you haven't already. Since we have similar tastes, do have any recommendations for me?

Also if anyone can find a copy of these books, that would be awesome. I've been looking everywhere with no success.

Mr. Penumbra's 24-Hour Bookstore - Robin Sloan
Rare Earth - Paul Mason
The Little Red Guard - Wenguang Huang 
China in 10 words - Yu Hua

China in 10 words - Yu Hua

avaxhome dot ws

Thank you! I have been looking for these books with no luck and wanted to see if you have any of them. Nonfiction mostly

The Letter:My Journey of Love, Loss and Life Marie Tillman

What Remains Carole Radziwill

Two autobiographies by Tatum O'Neal

A Paper Life
Found: A Daughter's Journey Home

Alison Wonderland Helen Smith

@LordGod88 - Thanks! I think I had found that before but didn't want to download the iLivid thing that they make you use, but it worked in the end! That book will definitely be in my next upload.

@tiddlywink - I don't have any of those books now either. I do have Being Light by Helen Smith, but since I got that on this site you've probably gotten it by now as well. I'll add them to my list of books to hunt for though. Cheers!

Thanks for this collection. I wonder if you would have a any of Suart Slades Alternative WW2 novels the Big One, Anvil of Necessity, the Great Game, Crusade, Ride of the Valkyries, and Lion Resurgent. also would you have Castros Bomb by Robert Conroy thanks bookguy

Thanks for this collection I wonder if you would have any of Stuart Slades alternative WW2 novels the Big One, Anvil of Necessity, the Great Game, Crusade, Ride of the Valkyries, and Lion Resurgent. and Castros Bomb by Robert Conroy, i would be most grateful thanks. bookguy
